title: Anyone just wanna talk?
body:
Just had one of the roughest games ever, while getting talked down on and just wanna chat. How're you guys doing on this fine preseason eve?{{champion:32}}

Edit: off to bed ty everyone for the chat :) And happy preseason!

replies.body:
Riot probably not allowed to answer this but will we see the legacy Halloween skins this year?

The most interesting change is no mana pots. Either this is being compensated in base stats/item changes or people are going to have to change the way they play!

As for the skins I'm not sure :c but as for pots they said they went through the data and looked to see who bought more than one mana potion then either buffed mana per 5 (mages/sups) or buffed the total mana pool (adcs).  And the new flask system is cheaper and upgradeable to include mana! if you want i can find the reddit thread

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-29T09:16:38.871+0000)
>
> As for the skins I'm not sure :c but as for pots they said they went through the data and looked to see who bought more than one mana potion then either buffed mana per 5 (mages/sups) or buffed the total mana pool (adcs).  And the new flask system is cheaper and upgradeable to include mana! if you want i can find the reddit thread

We are all going to have to buy a {{item:3070}} haha
{{item:3070}} + {{item:3508}} +{{item:3078}} = {{champion:236}} bolt back from the dead!

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-29T09:22:15.365+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} + {{item:3508}} +{{item:3078}} = {{champion:236}} bolt back from the dead!

Blucian!
That was a good two weeks of "nerfed" lucian. The e spam was so fun and so broken.

> [{quoted}](name=Cheetah Sensei,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-29T09:14:12.362+0000)
>
> Riot probably not allowed to answer this but will we see the legacy Halloween skins this year?
> 
> The most interesting change is no mana pots. Either this is being compensated in base stats/item changes or people are going to have to change the way they play!

Yeah, definitely can't answer that one, I have no idea! I'm curious about mana pots too. I have to admit, I buy them almost every game, so I'm suuuuper curious how that will be.
you shall learn to buy 1 faerie charm instead of 4 mana pots
Hello! I like talking. I'm just sitting here browsin' the boards. You?
-*waves*-
whoa a red wasn't expecting that! I'm just reading new preseason changes and tinkering with some code thats due tomorrow

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:41:56.372+0000)
>
> whoa a red wasn't expecting that! I'm just reading new preseason changes and tinkering with some code thats due tomorrow

Code eh? What kind of coding do you do? I don't know anything about it, but it seems neat

Still learning but Im taking 2 classes one thats QT which is a framework for c++ that has gui(graphical user interface) elements and java. Just learned regular expression which allow for you to sort through stings in a certain way and was thinking of a way parse red tracker html, read out new enteries to the program and then display the title with a link on the program to take me to it. Kinda as if i hit f5 every minute or so.

I took some Coding 101 classes during my brief stint in community college. I think it would have been interesting but I had a teacher that made it The Most Boring Thing Ever. Disappointing because I tend to think in very analytical and precise terms that I think would help in that environment (code is acting weird, could be A, B, or C, let's see how many ways I can test this).

But in the end I fell into my current job and it took off so I didn't end up following up. Definitely have respect for anyone who pursues coding though. Keep up the work :)

Im stuck in CC for another year (2 so far) but im taking every coding class that i can. It does really depend on your professors but luckily enough all of ours are adjuncts who are also like ctos of new companies or have experiences with startups so theyre young enough to know what its like to be a student. Coding is super analytical when it comes to debugging but the hardest part is finding creative solutions when nothing works xD
I'm gonna be heading off to try to sleep, thx so much for hanging out really made my right better. If youre ever down for a game Open invite! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2015-10-29T09:44:57.621+0000)
>
> I'm gonna be heading off to try to sleep, thx so much for hanging out really made my right better. If youre ever down for a game Open invite! ^-^

Sounds good, feel free to add me, I'm on NA :D 
G'night!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:36:14.238+0000)
>
> Hello! I like talking. I'm just sitting here browsin' the boards. You?

I hate to derail this thread, but since you are a red I have to ask. Why don't I have a pbe account, im plat+, am a devoted marksman main with thousands of games, why have i not been invited to pbe yet? I thought you guys invite people to pbe when they relate to what you testing, like say those vayne nerfs last patch despite the insane amount of games I have played on her?

Well that's completely off topic...

Have you put in for the PBE sign up, or are you just waiting for them to 'invite' you? I assume you've signed up for it but the way you phrased it sounded like you were waiting for a personalized invitation.
They might not need an adc yet, their new champ could be a tank for all we know
1. I kinda feel like {{champion:78}}  has been forgotten and really needs some sort of new kit

> [{quoted}](name=Ipicku,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:51:05.309+0000)
>
> 1. I kinda feel like {{champion:78}}  has been forgotten and really needs some sort of new kit

A rework for Poppy is on the way! There's a post about it somewhere...
We keep hearing soomTM on her but i know that they will do a good job with poopy :3

That's rough, sorry to hear that.

What you wanna chat about?
down for anything. im the kinda guy who f5s the red post ticker. I cant wait for the new {{champion:104}}  kit.

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:36:38.830+0000)
>
> down for anything. im the kinda guy who f5s the red post ticker. I cant wait for the new {{champion:104}}  kit.

New Grave is so cool :3 
I think you're probably going to really like him! It definitely feels way different than playing other adcs.

New Graves sounds amazing. I'm really excited for his changes. He was the first ADC that I actually enjoyed playing. Judging by the approximate time of his release, I think he'll make a fine Christmas present from Rito to me.

I don't own Graves but I will soon
That new kit is the bee's knees
especially dat E <3 it's design perfection
Idk why but ive always like the shotgun types from other games so to see it fleshed out in league gives me the butterflys

They definitely look interesting. Definitely a few things that concern me - changes is always scary - but I think there is a lot of potential. My biggest issue with standard ADCs was how uniform they felt. "Build AD/Crit & right-click" with a few abilities thrown in. Now they will certainly have a unique area.

I'm a little sad that Ezreal isn't getting much love. And it looks like some of the item changes may only hurt him (ER now grants CDR based off Crit, but Ezreal doesn't really want crit.. ) and as an Ez main since day 1, I'm a little concerned. There are a ton of totally new items though so I'm hoping he finds a combination that works for him.

I'm actually surprised that I didn't see any changes to Manamune, of all things.
Im a rank 5 {{champion:81}}  but i like to go ap mid :3 but {{item:3508}} + {{item:3078}} depending on numbers would give him 40% cdr from 2 items! That would be pretty cool.

I've played him everywhere. I've been playing since the beta so you have to find ways to keep things interesting :P I recently played him in the jungle actually xD

AP Mid is definitely fun, although I'm just really out of practice with it so I still take him AD bot most games. I get how the ER/TF combo would be good in some ways, it just doesn't quite jive with me on paper (accepting that it may feel totally different in-game). Yes, casters want CDR to spam spells. But Casters are generally focused as much, or more, on their abilities than on their AAs. So its just a sort of mixed message when it comes to crit items. Especially since Ezreal can't crit on his Q, he focuses more AD and on-hit effects (note how most of the on-hit items they've had to nerf have come from Ez abusing it. {{item:3025}} got ranged passive nerfed after Blue Ezreal first hit the scene, Runeglaive was fixed because AP Ez abused the procs)

I've spoken [at length](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/hgs4Y8Bw-spelunking-into-ezreals-gameplay-words-from-a-beta-player) before on Ez's strengths and weaknesses and so far I haven't seen anything really directed towards where I feel he is lacking.

But hey, this is just the start of a very long road so we'll see what comes down the pipe.

Wow thats some true love for {{champion:81}}. I have a pbe account and tomorrow if theres anything you want tested on him that i can relay info id be glad to help. I'm excited to enjoy playing adc again.

I had a PBE account years ago and I'm trying to access it again so I can play and post on the PBE boards. However its been so long I think it might be inactive now xD I have a Support Ticket in to see if they can recover it but we'll see how it goes.
Hope you get it back. I love being able to give back by testing out the new stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=000000000001000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:57:46.594+0000)
>
> Wow thats some true love for {{champion:81}}. I have a pbe account and tomorrow if theres anything you want tested on him that i can relay info id be glad to help. I'm excited to enjoy playing adc again.

ADC hype! Definitely be sure to comment on the PBE Boards about all the update stuffs. I know that the teams behind all of the changes are really excited to chat with players and see what everyone thinks :-)
I will for sure i have the red tracker up over there and been reading all the replies, its great being able to participate in this years preseason!

> [{quoted}](name=SlackJackflack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:44:50.541+0000)
>
> Im a rank 5 {{champion:81}}  but i like to go ap mid :3 but {{item:3508}} + {{item:3078}} depending on numbers would give him 40% cdr from 2 items! That would be pretty cool.

I feel like Ez can just do everything. Back when we were working on Cleaver we were worried that it would be too strong for ADC's, but when we tested it that never happened. Turned out LW was usually just way better for ADCs, but we still had people building it on EZ, because, well... He's Ezreal {{item:3071}}
Its too true that he can kinda build what he wants. With some of the new items ive seen it looks like he will have so many options, but so will the others.

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:41:29.355+0000)
>
> They definitely look interesting. Definitely a few things that concern me - changes is always scary - but I think there is a lot of potential. My biggest issue with standard ADCs was how uniform they felt. "Build AD/Crit & right-click" with a few abilities thrown in. Now they will certainly have a unique area.
> 
> I'm a little sad that Ezreal isn't getting much love. And it looks like some of the item changes may only hurt him (ER now grants CDR based off Crit, but Ezreal doesn't really want crit.. ) and as an Ez main since day 1, I'm a little concerned. There are a ton of totally new items though so I'm hoping he finds a combination that works for him.
> 
> I'm actually surprised that I didn't see any changes to Manamune, of all things.

I wouldn't worry about Ez too much. He's always been a super resilient to meta changes since he can build in so many different ways. I didn't work on the marksmen stuff, but I'm guessing that's why he didn't get too much attention. He already has a pretty unique feel among marksmen :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Tt7amdMg,comment-id=0000000000010001,timestamp=2015-10-29T08:45:26.233+0000)
>
> He's always been a super resilient to meta changes since he can build in so many different ways.

It's true, and actually it speaks to how well Ezreal works - but in some ways that is exactly what concerns me. For example, several Reds have acknowledged that Essence Flux feels lacking for AD Ezreal. In fact most AD Ez players will agree that its a waste on him, especially early - too much mana for too little damage, its better to put the points into Q for better damage than try to squeeze out a little more DPS off W. The team buff is great mid-late game for taking objectives and team fights, but its still a relic of his original kit (I still remember the days when I could reduce enemy AS.. and heal my team.. all of them at once..)

But the fact that AD Ezreal can function as good as he does - rarely OP but never not viable - and he can do that basically *without* an entire ability? That's both awesome and unfortunate. Awesome because I can play and have fun and feel skilled and powerful when I do well against numerically stronger opponents with only 4/5 of a kit, but unfortunate because a) he isn't at his full potential and b) if he was, the rest of his kit would likely have to be downgraded to avoid him getting too strong.

I've [written about it before](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/hgs4Y8Bw-spelunking-into-ezreals-gameplay-words-from-a-beta-player) but didn't get much of a response, but I agree that Ezreal has always been pretty stable. He's just my absolute favorite since the day he was released and I want to see him grow <3
Thx man for hanging out imma head off if you want i cold add ya and maybe play some norms together.
Sure thing!
I'm just really excited to see the Caitlyn changes, she's kind of fallen off ever since hyper carries started to dominate

Really hope Aniva gets a little mana love. 

I kinda feel like it should still be just Valor flying around instead of Quinn and Valor but I haven't actually seen it yet. :(

im an adc main and I'm ultra hype for these changes(yes I'm bronze 2)



i was on a post that i made and somebody made me feel irrelevant just because he said your bronze 2.....im sad QQ

I'm pretty sure the preseason's going to be the end of Duo lane Mordekaiser.
The tri force changes will hit his solo pretty hard too

I truely hope that eventually there will be a balance to where morde is balanced and able to be in the botlane. The experiment has been fun and with new items we havent seen yet he might be better solo! :D
